department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Soliciting the Supply of Lumber and Small Hardware Goods
description: This procurement is for the supply of Goods as described in the Solicitation Documents (Annex A and B).
full_summary:
### Public Services and Procurement Notice
#### Contract Award for Lumber and Hardware

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Parks Canada, invites proposals from qualified contractors for the supply of lumber and hardware goods listed in Annex B.

**Tender Details**

*   Bid Title: Lumber and Hardware
*   Grouping: Lumber and Related Basic Wood Material, Plywood and Veneer, and Building Components, Prefabricated
*   Reference Number: PW-NCS-073-12323
*   Solicitation Number: 5P419-220051/A
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) commodities
*   Posting Date: September 23, 2022
*   Closing Date and Time: October 25, 2022, 4:00 PM EDT
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Tender Status: Expired

**Contract Requirements**

Public Services and Procurement Canada requires the supply of goods in the form of lumber and small hardware items listed in Annex B. The goods will be used as construction materials at Auyuittuq National Park, Pangnirtung, Nunavut. Delivery of the goods will be to Parks Canada Wareways, located at 1840 Bourgogne Avenue, Chambly, Quebec, J3L 1Z3, where they will be transported by Parks Canada to Nunavut in the spring. 

**Bidders Eligibility**

Only bidders registered on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR) may qualify for the contract award.

**Document Submission**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Attachments**

The following attachments are available in the Bid Opportunities section of the Canada.ca website:

*   [PW-NCS-073-12323_EBSU001](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/c5c1798e31b25ce152c09d81c8864fbd/ABES.PROD.PW_NCS.B073.E12323.EBSU001.PDF)
*   [PW-NCS-073-12323_EBSU002](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/17/faee09dac7f2ef79af5366fd3c719f5e/ABES.PROD.PW_N
